content:

Firefox is up to date 131.0.3

title: Problemi, solo con Firefox nella visualizzazione dei campi precompilati dei siti
content: Riscontro problemi, solo con Firefox nella visualizzazione dei campi precompilati dei siti; aprendo un sito dove mi viene richiesto di selezionare da un campo a discesa un valore, tali valori sono modificati da Firefox. vi allego esempio, nella riceca di un numero civico su firefox e su crome, sul primo i civici vengono indicati come "anni" nel secondo come numero corretto (vedi foto). Ho reinstallato firefox ma nessun cambiamento. Questo si verifica con tutti i siti dove si trovano campi precompilati.
creator: aletrip

title: Extension settings reset when C drive has limited disk space
content: I keep the browser open and at some time my C drive has limited disk space.(~100mb) Then extensions stop working and after a browser restart, all extension data are lost. In my opinion current extension data shouldn't be lost even if disk space is limited.

title: Extensions no longer appearing on toolbar after a Mac software update
content:
Hey! I did two updates this morning. One was removing my ex-wife as a computer admin, which meant that I'm now my Mac's primary admin. The second was downloading the Mac software update that addressed a security flaw.

As you can see in the image attached, I now no longer see my extensions in my toolbar. I've re-installed them and they appear for a second and then disappear. This includes uBlock origin and Bitwarden - neither which appear to be operating even though they appear in my Settings to be active. Any suggestions?
creator: rsigesmund

title: Firefox signs me out immediately after signing into my Mozilla account.
content:
Today, I opened the container extension and it asked me if I wanted to sync my containers across devices.

I re-entered my credentials so that I could. While I did manage to get my synced containers, Firefox signed me out of my Mozilla account immediately after I did.

Naturally, I decided to sign back in. It kicked me out again. Rinse and repeat.
creator: kallofox34
